channel.title: How Do I Change Xp Rates On My Server?
channel.description: The title says it all, please help me out I wanna make my server have like 2x runescape rates or 3x. Thanks. :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2009, 07:40:14 am[/size][hr]Does any1 know?

item.title: How Do I Change Xp Rates On My Server?

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Check your Attack and AttackNPC methods

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Change Xp Rates On My Server?
item.dc:creator: @nubra nubra
item.description:
@nubra wrote:

For my server I just go into my client.java and search for TotalExp and something like this pops up

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
{
TotalExp = (double) (#### * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
} else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive
{
TotalExp = (double) (#### * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
} else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive
{
TotalExp = (double) (#### * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
} else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled
{
TotalExp = (double) (#### * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double) (#### * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
actionTimer = 7;

This is just for range, attack, str, def, and hit points. Just change the ####'s to the exp rate you want. Runescape is 4 I think?

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change Xp Rates On My Server?

item.title: How Do I Change Xp Rates On My Server?
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

if u talk about npcs, it will depends of the source you’re using…
on anyway, you will need to go to your client file, and there search for somethng like addskillxp…
or just search the id of the skill, [1] for def as example…
you are gonna learn much more about source by doing that and also will probaly find a way to set exp.
